meanings.definition: The rough, tough skin of a shark.
meanings.sent1: The sharkskin felt rough to the touch.
meanings.sent3: The sharkskin made the shark look like a true warrior of the sea.
meanings.sent4: His determination was as strong as sharkskin.
meanings.sent5: The sharkskin's texture was as rugged as a mountain.

meanings.definition: A fabric made to resemble the skin of a shark.
meanings.sent1: The dress was made of sharkskin fabric.
meanings.sent2: He loved the sleek look of sharkskin material.
meanings.sent3: The sharkskin fabric made her feel like a fierce predator.
meanings.sent4: The suit was as smooth as sharkskin.
meanings.sent5: The sharkskin fabric shimmered like the ocean under the sun.
